index.usage_instructions: Use this tool to extract and play MP4 URLs from Twitch embed links.
index.how_to_get_embed_url: How to Get an Embed URL
index.detailed_instructions: To extract the embed URL, follow these steps:
index.step_1: Open the Twitch clip you want to extract.
index.step_2: Click the 'Share' button below the video player.
index.step_5: Extract the URL from the `src` attribute in the embed code.
index.step_6: Remove the `&parent` parameter if it exists.
index.step_7: Paste the cleaned URL into the input field below.
index.error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
